```{r setup, include=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)

data("instacart")


insta <- instacart |>
mutate(
reordered = if_else(reordered == 1, "Yes", "No"),
order_dow = factor(order_dow, levels = 0:6,
labels = c("Sun","Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat"))
)

orders_by_hour <- insta |>
filter(!is.na(order_hour_of_day)) |>
count(order_hour_of_day, name = "n") |>
arrange(order_hour_of_day)

top_aisles <- insta |>
count(aisle, name = "n", sort = TRUE) |>
slice_head(n = 10) |>
mutate(aisle = fct_reorder(aisle, n))

box_dat <- insta |>
filter(!is.na(add_to_cart_order), add_to_cart_order > 0, add_to_cart_order <= 60) |>
select(reordered, add_to_cart_order)

```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
plot_ly(
data = orders_by_hour,
x = ~order_hour_of_day, y = ~n, type = "scatter", mode = "lines+markers"
) |>
layout(
title = "Order Volume by Hour",
xaxis = list(title = "Hour of Day (0â€“23)"),
yaxis = list(title = "Number of Orders")
)

```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
plot_ly(
data = top_aisles,
x = ~n, y = ~aisle, type = "bar", orientation = "h",
hovertemplate = "Aisle: %{y}<br>Orders: %{x}<extra></extra>"
) |>
layout(
title = "Most-Ordered Aisles",
xaxis = list(title = "Orders"),
yaxis = list(title = "")
)

```

### Chart C

```{r}
plot_ly(
data = box_dat,
x = ~reordered, y = ~add_to_cart_order, type = "box"
) |>
layout(
title = "Items Added Earlier if Previously Ordered",
xaxis = list(title = "Previously Ordered?"),
yaxis = list(title = "Add-to-Cart Position (lower = earlier)")
)

```
